definition: in a mess/scattered about/in complete disorder
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party

sentences.english: Red fire ants like these in the American south have gotten a bad rap in our world.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，南美洲出现的这种红火蚁已经是声名狼藉。

sentences.english: Your father will bawl you out when he sees this mess.
sentences.chinese: 你的父亲将会大骂你的当他看到这堆狼藉。

sentences.english: He was notorious as a gambler and rake.
sentences.chinese: 他是声名狼藉的赌徒和浪荡子。

sentences.english: Old books gnawed by old rats, scattered about your room.
sentences.chinese: 故书穷鼠啮，狼藉一室间。

sentences.english: As as a result, his house was extremely cluttered.
sentences.chinese: 结果他的房子一片狼藉。

sentences.english: The tip of the pencil breaks against the bright paper.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔尖把那张亮白的纸弄得狼藉一片。

sentences.english: His office was a disaster area of papers and full ashtrays.
sentences.chinese: 他的办公室一片狼藉，文件成堆，烟灰满缸。

sentences.english: The now-infamous" Wand Order Problem" was corrected in later editions of the book.
sentences.chinese: 目前身名狼藉的“魔杖倒序问题”在再版中被更正了。

sentences.english: Houses swept by a tsunami smoulder near Sendai Airport …
sentences.chinese: 仙台机场附近的房屋被海啸摧毁，一片狼藉。

sentences.english: Scandals at some of the biggest comités d’entreprise have given all a bad name.
sentences.chinese: 一些最大的企业委员会的丑闻已声名狼藉。

sentences.english: The Parliament was in bad odour among the people.
sentences.chinese: 该国议会在百姓心目中已是声名狼藉。

sentences.english: Ugh. The bad news: Your house is a mess.
sentences.chinese: 啊，不幸的是，你家里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: She achieved notoriety for her affair with the senator.
sentences.chinese: 她因为和参议员的风流韵事而声名狼藉。

sentences.english: Ellison's most notorious romance ended up in court.
sentences.chinese: 埃里森最为声名狼藉的罗曼史终结于法庭。

sentences.english: Pride breakfasted with Plenty, dined with Poverty, and supped with Infamy .
sentences.chinese: 骄者往往早餐丰盛，午餐寒酸，晚餐时声名狼藉。

sentences.english: Washington's financial institutions were once notorious for their dogmatic prescriptions.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿的金融机构曾因它们教条的处方而声名狼藉。

definition: cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
wound/skin ulcer/(fig.) the desolation of trauma/desolation in the aftermath of a disaster
to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
